accesses.approved:travel: Initiate Own Travel Expenses Without Approval

alerts.apiKeyAlreadyExists: An API key already exists. This action will permanently overwrite it.
alerts.apiKeyShownOnlyOnce: This API key is shown only once. Please copy and store it securely—you won't be able to view it again.
alerts.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure that you want to delete this?
alerts.areYouSureMerge: Are you sure you want to merge these users? This cannot be undone.
alerts.defaultLastPlaceOfWork: Default value for last place of work
alerts.departureAndArrivalOnDifferentDaysX: Are you sure you were sitting in '{X}' for several days?
alerts.draftsWillBeLost: All drafts will be lost once you leave this page! Add receipts and save them so they are retained.
alerts.fileTypeOfXNotSupportedY: File type of '{X}' not supported. Supported file types are: {Y}.
alerts.fileXToLargeMaxIsY: File '{X}' is too large. Maximum allowed size is {Y}.
alerts.fillOut: Please provide the following information so we can better match your statements.
alerts.futureNotAllowed: Date is not allowed to be in the future

noData.advanceForUserX: No approved advance for '{X}'. Apply for one!
noData.expense: There are no expenses yet. Add one!
noData.healthCareCost: You have not submitted any health care costs yet.
noData.stage: There are no stages yet. Add one!

alerts.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
alerts.warningReapply: By reapplying, entries may get lost which then lie outside the reapplied time window.

description.keyFullIdentifier: The key is the complete identifier, e.g: {"labels.new": "NEW"}

info.advance: Select the advances you want to offset against your expenses here.
info.cateringRefund: If the meal is already paid by the employer (e.g. conference fee / breakfast in hotel) no meal allowance can be reimbursed. Please enter which meals are already paid by the employer.
info.claimSpouseRefund: If you are traveling with your spouse and he is also eligible for reimbursement, you can bill him as well.
info.destinationName: Name of the accommodation or company
info.destinationPlace: Specify here the place that is the destination of your trip.
info.exactAddress: Enter the exact address of your destination here.
info.fellowTravelersNames: Enter here all names of the persons traveling with you (e.g.: spouse, children)
info.insurance: Select your health insurance company, which will be asked to reimburse your health costs.
info.isCrossBorder: Specify whether the trip is a cross-border trip.
info.lastPlaceOfWork: Select your last place of work here, this is decisive for the lump sums of your departure.
info.loseAccessAt: Set a date here from which the user should no longer have access to @:{'headlines.title'}@:{'headlines.emoji'}
info.midnightCountries: Specify which country you were in at midnight, the food allowance depends on it.
info.overnightRefund: You can either claim overnight lump sums or account for the actual cost of overnight accommodations.
info.patientName: Enter the name of the person for whom the costs were incurred.
info.professionalShareX%: A business trip may also have private components, but these may not account for {X}% or more.
info.project: Select the project to be billed.
info.purpose: Specify which purpose this stage served.
info.reason: Briefly state the reason for your trip here.
info.special: Select a city here IF one from the selection applies. There are special lump sums for some cities.
info.travelInsideOfEU: Is your trip a cross-country trip within the EU?
info.vehicleRegistration: Upload the vehicle registration of your car here.

one.two: symbol (on the top, next to address bar).

steps.one: 1. By using the menu or the share menu and clicking on 'Add to Home Screen' or 'Install' the installation can be started.

installation.header: Install the App with these steps:

one.two: Menu (on the top, next to address bar).
Menu (in the middle of the bottom).

labels.a1CertificateEmail: Email address for A1 certificate notifications
labels.allowSpouseRefund: Allow accounting for spouses when traveling
labels.allowTravelApplicationForThePast: Allow travel applications for the past
labels.deleteApprovedTravelAfterXDaysUnused: Delete approved, unused trips - in days
labels.deleteBookedAfterXDays: Delete booked reports and trips - in days
labels.deleteInWorkReportsAfterXDaysUnused: Delete unused expense and healthcare cost reports - in days
labels.delOverwritten: Should the overwritten user be deleted?
labels.factorCateringLumpSum: Factor for the catering lump sums
labels.factorCateringLumpSumExceptions: Exceptions to the factorization of the catering lump sums
labels.factorOvernightLumpSum: Factor for the overnight lump sums
labels.factorOvernightLumpSumExceptions: Exceptions to the factorization of the overnight lump sums
labels.fallbackLumpSumCountry: Fall back country for lump sums
labels.label: Label
labels.mailXDaysBeforeDeletion: Receive notification mail before deletion - in days
labels.maxTravelDayCount: Maximum length of a business trip [days]
labels.minHoursOfTravel: Minimum duration of a business trip [hours]
labels.minProfessionalShare: Minimum professional share of a business trip
labels.name: Name
labels.secondNightOnAirplaneLumpSumCountry: Country for the catering lump sums from the 2nd night in an aircraft
labels.secondNightOnShipOrFerryLumpSumCountry: Country for the catering lump sums from the 2nd night on a ship
labels.sendPDFReportsToOrganisationEmail: Send PDF reports to organisation email
labels.toleranceStageDatesToApprovedTravelDates: Deviation tolerance of the stages from the requested dates [days]
labels.vehicleRegistrationWhenUsingOwnCar: Vehicle registration if traveling with own car

APPLIED_FOR.paragraph: A new advance request from {owner} just came in.
APPLIED_FOR.subject: 🆕 New advance request

APPROVED.paragraph: Your advance request has been approved.

newMagiclogin.lastParagraph:
To log in, all you need is your email address.
Click on 'Sign in with Email', enter your email address and you will receive an email with a link that will log you in directly when you click on it.
newMagiclogin.paragraph: Welcome to @:{'headlines.title'}@:{'headlines.emoji'}. Here you can submit all your expenses.
newMagiclogin.subject: Welcome to @:{'headlines.title'}@:{'headlines.emoji'}

toInsurance.subject: Reimbursement Health Care Costs BN:{companyNumber}
